index.online_plugins_desc: Browse and install plugins from online sources

404.title: 404 - Page Not Found
404.description: Sorry, the page you visited does not exist or is unavailable.

room.desc: Welcome to the web portal of the server chat section (we recommend chatting in-game)

about.subtitle: Learn about the background, origins and open source information of GUGU WebUI.
about.source_desc: GUGU WebUI was originally inspired by the idea that the GUGUbot plugin should have its own WebUI. At that time GUGUbot was still relatively simple, so a dedicated WebUI was not added, but this sparked the idea of building a more general‑purpose WebUI plugin, which eventually became GUGU WebUI, originating from GUGUbot.

projects.gugubot_desc: The original automation bot and chat features that created the need for web management.
projects.cq_desc: Provides QQ‑side message forwarding and integration, extending how the server connects to the outside world.
projects.web_desc: An evolution based on the previous two, focusing on a more modern WebUI management experience.

about.opensource_desc: As an open source project, GUGU WebUI welcomes bug reports, pull requests, documentation updates and localization contributions.
about.thanks_desc: Thanks to all developers and server admins who contributed code, suggestions and testing to GUGU WebUI. Your support keeps this project evolving.

items.mcdr_repo_desc: Provides a rich MCDR plugin ecosystem, forming the foundation of this project’s features.
items.mc_server_info: Base implementation for querying Minecraft server status and player information.
items.codemirror: Provides code highlighting and editing experience for configuration editors.
items.deepseek: Powers some of the intelligent assistant features.
items.tailwind: Utility‑first CSS framework that underpins the current UI design.
items.alpine: Lightweight interaction framework used in the legacy frontend.
items.fontawesome: Icon library used in the legacy interface.
items.vditor: WYSIWYG Markdown editor used in some editing scenarios.

items.looseprince_desc: Feature design, documentation, web design and frontend implementation.
items.xuek66_desc: Code development, maintenance and feature design.
items.feedbackers: All users who provided feedback and testing
items.feedbackers_desc: Filed issues and suggestions during real‑world usage and helped the project improve continuously.
items.cursor: Significantly improved development efficiency during refactors and iterations.
items.contributors_link_desc: See the full contributor list on GitHub.

login.go_chat: I'm a player, I need to access the server chat page
